titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit certain eligible veterans to purchase up to $20,000 of National Service Life Insurance.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Permits an eligible veteran to purchase additional National Service Life Insurance in an amount equal to the amount of National Service Life Insurance such veteran already has in force.
